detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Folk (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Folk.sol#80-200) has payable functions:
	 - Folk.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Folk.sol#189-191)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Folk](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Folk.sol#L80-L200) has payable functions:
	 - [Folk.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Folk.sol#L189-L191)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
